sourceMeaningMnemonic:
Use a <radical>flag</radical> to <radical>compare</radical> your <kanji>flatulence</kanji>.

Note that some dictionaries incorrectly list <ja>おなら</ja> as a reading for this, because the meaning is the same.
meaningInfo: How do you compare your flatulence? I recommend a flag. You can see which fart is strongest by seeing how much the flag flutters.
readingMnemonic: If your <kanji>flatulence</kanji> is really strong, you may need to get <reading>he</reading>lp (<ja>へ</ja>).
readingInfo: If you're consistently coming out on top in the flag competition, you might want to consider getting medical help.
